Quiver combines a powerful, lightweight snippet manager with text expansion capabilities, letting you create custom shortcuts that expand into your frequently used text with just a few keystrokes.

Perfect For:
- Readers who want to save and export their highlights from multiple sources with citations
- Developers who need quick access to code snippets ("/react" for React boilerplate)
- Customer support teams using response templates ("/thanks" for thank you messages)
- Writers managing multiple templates ("/intro" for article introductions)
- Sales teams handling repetitive emails ("/follow" for follow-up templates)
- Anyone who types the same text repeatedly

Why Quiver?
Quiver stands out by combining the best of two worlds: a snippet manager and a text expander. While other tools focus on just storing snippets or just expanding text, Quiver does both seamlessly. Save time and maintain consistency in your writing by transforming frequently used text into simple shortcuts. Quiver runs fully locally and stores your data in your browser, making it private and secure. You can also download and delete your data at any time.
